decoworld.model.world.map

Class MapIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.model.world.map.MapIO

  • public class MapIO
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides methods to read and write map files.

      Constructors

      MapIO()
      Initialises a new MapIO instance.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MapIO

        public MapIO()

    • Method Detail

      • loadMap

        public Map loadMap(java.lang.String name)
            throws java.io.IOException
        Loads a map from disk, parses it and returns a Map object. If the Map file has more tiles in its data than width*height, the extra tile data is not read.
        Parameters:
        name - the template name of the map to load.
        Returns:
        a Map object loaded from disk.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • saveMap

        public void saveMap(Map map)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Saves the given Map back to disk.

        On the server this only saves the map's state, with its Tiles being treated as immutable. (Subject to change)

        If the Map should be instanced, however was loaded with 'playerId=0' through loadMap, then attempting to save such a Map will result in an invalid operation exception being thrown.

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
